Pre-Game Insights: Australia's blockbuster start to their World Cup campaign continues as they take on an in-form South Africa in Lucknow, just days after suffering a dramatic opening round defeat to India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The reason South Africa are so feared is that they boast what is arguably the most powerful batting line-up in all of cricket.
Others: The Aussies are a good, exciting team. But the luck of the draw has meant that they play two of the toughest opponents in the competition for their first two fixtures.
